## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? Why is it needed?

## Proposed Solution
Describe how you'd like this feature to work.

## Alternative Solutions
Have you considered any alternative approaches? If so, describe them here.

## Use Case
Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be useful.

## AWS Services
Which AWS services would this feature involve? (e.g., DynamoDB, RDS, API Gateway)

## Cost Impact
Would this feature have any AWS cost implications?
- [ ] No additional costs expected
- [ ] Minimal costs (within free tier)
- [ ] May exceed free tier

## Implementation Ideas
If you have ideas on how to implement this, share them here. (Optional)

## Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or screenshots about the feature request here.

- [ ] I'd like to implement this feature myself
